select B.PUBLISHER_NAME as publisherName, sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1001, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "action", sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1002, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "adventure", sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1003, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "sports", sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1004, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "rpg", sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1005, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "fps", sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1006, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "puzzle", sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1007, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "sim", sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1008, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "str", sum (decode(A.genre_no, 1009, PROFIT_SALES, 0)) "etc" from PROFITS A, PUBLISHERS B, GENRES C where A.PUBLISHER_NO = B.PUBLISHER_NO and A.GENRE_NO = C.GENRE_NO
and to_char(A.PROFIT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #keyword#
and to_char(A.PROFIT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') = #keyword#
group by B.PUBLISHER_NAME

and to_char(A.PROFIT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #keyword#
and to_char(A.PROFIT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') = #keyword#
group by B.PUBLISHER_NAME
